data.name: Brox
data.detailed_description:
Brox is a scriptable sandbox shooter game. Create and play unique gamemodes with cool abilities and fast paced gunplay.



Fight against bots or players in a fun, fast-paced gun fights!





Use unique abilities to take down your openents in faced paced gun fights!
You can even create your own abilities using JavaScript thank's to our simple-to-use scripting engine!





Create unique and awesome game modes in JavaScript using our simple-to-use scripting engine!
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Brox is a sandbox, scriptable shooter. Play unique game modes againts bots or players and create your own using simple to use JavaScript scripting!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel i5 @ 3.0 GHz or higher (or AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 or higher (or AMD equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectXÂ® compatible on-board

content_descriptors.notes: Oppressive ambiance, gunfight, and very few blood splatter when your character is hit.
